page.syntax: L AddUser(UserName as C, Password as C)
page.description: Create a new user in the currently connected database or server.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::AddUser() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .AddUser( UserName as C, Password as C ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object. UserNameThe user's login name. PasswordThe user's login password.
Description The AddUser() method creates a new user in the currently connected database or server. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='SQLServer', Server='doc3000', Trusted_connection=yes, Database='Northwind'}" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.adduser("Edward", "Techwriter") ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if conn.close()
See Also SQL::Connection Object
